text.__SUMMARY__: Bulbophyllum translucidum is a species of orchid in the genus Bulbophyllum  endemic to Samar, Leyte and Agusan, Philippines. It is named after the translucent nature of the tepals. It is placed in section Sestochilus.

Maximilian Kindler,Raab Bustamante & Ferreras 2016. Die Orchidee (Hamburg) Die Orchidee 2(4) .pdf
